https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/p3S1HcS9qU8Eadyd3VCIci0jxr8.jpg In a suburban town, a deadly monster lurks in the surrounding forest, killing all those who wander too close. Desperate to stop the attack, a group of elite soldiers are called in to handle the situation. The hunters quickly become the hunted as they struggle to kill the terrifying, fire-breathing beast. Dragon Soldiers
